UserDialog.Name: Name
UserDialog.ErrorMessageForMissingData: Please fill in all the required fields.
UserDialog.ErrorMessageForWrongEmail: The provided email address is invalid. Please provide a correct one.
UserDialog.EmailConfirmationSubject: Thank you for choosing Remind Me!
UserDialog.EmailConfirmationBody:
Hi [UserName],

Thank you for downloading and registering Remind Me, your new tool for efficient and fun remind management!

This is an automated email sent to confirm your registration. We will contact you by email only to inform you about new releases or important updates of the application.

In the meantime, if you have any questions, need assistance, or have suggestions, we are always here for you. You can reach us at [SupportEmail].

Thank you again for choosing Remind Me, and enjoy managing your reminds!

Best regards,
The Remind Me Team
